```{r}

#####Loading Packages

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(pwr)

###reading in the csv data file and getting some summary counts

gcdf <-read_csv("gc_df.csv")

get_guns<- gcdf %>% 
  filter(gender !="NA", make_get_guns != "NA") %>% 
  count(gender,make_get_guns) %>% 
  spread(make_get_guns, n) %>% 
  select(-gender)

rownames(get_guns)<- c("female", "male")
```
